Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 43rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: Westbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Saint Lawrence, 42nd, King Drive, and 43rd due to, street blockage near 43rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Saint Lawrence, 42nd, King Drive, and 43rd due to, street blockage near 43rd/Vincennes.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Southbound Reroute near King Drive/87th
ShortDescription: Southbound 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 87th, Cottage Grove, 95th and King Drive, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 87th, Cottage Grove, 95th and King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/87th.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Brown Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Brown Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
